item.title: Delta forecasts more sales growth in 2025 thanks to high-end demand, 'resilient economy'
item.description: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

item.title: Trump names former wrestling executive Linda McMahon as his pick for education secretary
item.description: McMahon, who is a co-chair of Trump's transition team, led the Small Business Administration during Trump's first term.
